com.cscguru.client.ui

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape
      • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
        • com.cscguru.client.ui.BoundBox
          • com.cscguru.client.ui.Camera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClickable, IDrawable, IUpdatable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Camera
extends BoundBox
implements IUpdatable, IDrawable, IClickable
    Handles the display of the world map.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
